identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
identity.core_philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Function is Beauty.

theme_strategy.justification: User requested light theme. Fits the 'clean workshop' aesthetic better than dark mode for this specific B2B/utilitarian context.

rules: NO GRADIENTS. Flat, solid colors only.
Use 'Zinc' scale from Tailwind for all greys.
Primary color (Orange) is for ACTIONS only (Buttons, Links). Never for decoration.
Borders are essential. Use them to define structure (Grid Borders).

font_family.mono: ui-monospace, SFMono-Regular, Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, monospace

styles.h1: text-4xl md:text-5xl font-bold tracking-tighter uppercase text-zinc-950
styles.h2: text-2xl md:text-3xl font-bold tracking-tight uppercase text-zinc-900
styles.label: text-xs font-bold uppercase tracking-widest text-zinc-500

rules: Visible borders between grid items (border-r border-b).
Dense layouts. Avoid excessive whitespace in data-heavy areas (tables, lists).
Mobile-first: Stack columns on mobile, expand to 3-4 columns on desktop.

specifics.buttons: uppercase font-bold tracking-wide rounded-none h-12 px-8 hover:translate-y-[-1px] active:translate-y-[1px] transition-transform
specifics.cards: bg-white border border-zinc-200 p-6 hover:border-zinc-400 transition-colors rounded-none
specifics.inputs: rounded-none border-zinc-300 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-orange-500 focus:border-transparent h-12 bg-zinc-50
specifics.badges: rounded-none uppercase tracking-wider font-bold text-[10px] px-2 py-1

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay (opacity 0.02) on backgrounds to reduce digital sterility.
visual_enhancers.icons: Lucide React (Stroke width 1.5px for elegance, 2px for bold actions).
visual_enhancers.micro_interactions: Buttons scale slightly down on click. Links have a heavy underline on hover.

media.image_style: High contrast, desaturated or black & white for atmospheric shots. Product shots on pure white or light grey backgrounds.

aspect_ratios.hero: aspect-[21/9] object-cover grayscale hover:grayscale-0 transition-all duration-700

instructions_to_main_agent: IMPLEMENTATION PRIORITY: Functionality > Aesthetics. This is a tool for mechanics.
Use the 'Zinc' color scale from Tailwind for a neutral, industrial look.
Avoid rounded corners. Use 'rounded-none' or 'rounded-sm' for a sharp, precise feel.
Ensure high contrast for all text. Accessibility is key for this audience.
Use the provided image URLs for the respective categories.
For the 'Catalog' page, use a dense grid layout (Mode B).
For the 'Product' page, focus on the image and the 'Add to Cart' button.
Do not use 'About Us' or other fluff pages. Stick to the requested functionality.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) sparingly, only for sticky headers.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: `transition: all`. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable
